amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the EPA Office of Enforcement by $1 million for enforcement of bilateral agreements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record regarding environmental programs and management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Dingell.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
